title: DSC and Qolsys Growing
text: Australian security wholesaler BGW Technologies reports that its intrusion business has again shown strong growth over the last 12 month.

title: Join Pelco at the Security Exhibition at Sydney ICC
text: Wednesday to Friday for the biggest security Exhibition for over 3 years. Catch up to the Pelco and BGW Technologies crew and get a run down on some of the new products.

title: Join i-Pro at the Security Exhibition
text: 17, 18, 19 August at Sydney ICC. Meet up to the local BGW Technologies staff and the i-PRO APAC teams for a demo of the latest Ai products on Stand H16.
